
Changelog
=========

1.0.6
-----

* Bugfix:
    (src/lxml/lxml.etree.c:47744)
    IndexError: list index out of range

1.0.5
-----

* Removed entrypoints
* Updated MANIFEST.in

1.0.4
-----

* Improved Documentation/Readme
* Corrected dependencies

1.0.3
-----

* Added MANIFEST.in to make package installable

1.0.1 and 1.0.2
---------------

* Some smaller changes ind Readme and setup.py to improve the documentation

1.0 - Initial release
---------------------

* Autotagging for Images based on meta information and title
* Autorotation for Images based on Exif
* Possibilities to configure Autotagging
* Managing Keywords by a modified KeywordManager
* Retaging and Previews for Folder-Contents-View
